fields.name: Create
fields.description: This is the initial Stage of any task

fields.name: ToDo
fields.description: This is the first stage of the Task

fields.name: InProgress
fields.description: This is the Inprogress State of the Task

fields.name: Done
fields.description: This is the Completed State of the Task

fields.name: Declined
fields.description: This is the Declined State of the Task

fields.name: INPROGRESS
fields.description: This is the InProgress Transition from TODO to INPROGRESS

fields.name: DONE
fields.description: This is the Done Transition from INPROGRESS to DONE State

fields.name: DECLINED
fields.description: This is the Declined Transitions from ToDo to Declined

fields.name: DECLINED
fields.description: This is the Declined Transitions from Inprogress to Declined

fields.name: TODO
fields.description: This is the initial transition, which will apply once the Task has been created.

fields.name: default
fields.description: This is the default Tracker Workflow.
